backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature update for the hidden Yes button after the No button cracks, including affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries of key frontend Valentine-themed components and styles.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base variables and theming for light/dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders ValentineExperience inside a pink gradient layout.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Correc: Shows an animated heart and randomized romantic message after correct quiz answers.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Dodgin: Implements the dodging No button with crack animation and a revealed hidden Yes button that triggers onYes.
frontend/src/components/valentine/effect: Generates falling confetti pieces that auto-clear after a delay.
Creates animated floating hearts that rise and disappear after a delay.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Propos: Displays the main Valentine proposal with Yes button and dodging No button wired to the success flow.
frontend/src/components/valentine/quizCo: Defines quiz questions, answer options, and correct answers.
frontend/src/components/valentine/QuizFl: Controls quiz progression, showing feedback and moving to the transition step before proposal.
frontend/src/components/valentine/QuizQu: Renders a quiz question with selectable answers and resets state between questions.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Succes: Final success message screen with animated hearts.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Transi: A timed transition card that leads from quiz completion to the proposal screen.
frontend/src/components/valentine/useNoB: React hook that moves a button away from pointer or touch when too close, keeping it within container bounds.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Manages overall app flow between quiz, proposal, and success with confetti and hearts effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and exposing login/clear actions with status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining Valentine-themed colors and multiple animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Valentine proposal app, requirements, features, issues, and architecture notes.
